description:
Package Files and Software in Installers for Easy Distribution

Paquet Builder is a powerful installer software and an advanced Self-Extracting 7z (7zip archive) tool designed for professional file and software distribution.
With Paquet Builder, you can easily create compact, fully-customized Windows installer packages that simplify software delivery and enhance user experience.
- Changed project saving behavior: projects created with older versions are now consistently saved in UTF-8 format.
- Resolved Unicode encoding issues with emoticons to ensure correct display in dialog boxes.
- Fixed the Sleep custom action that was not working as expected with the new C compiler.
- Updated error reporting for SignTool: instead of displaying an error message when SignTool is not found, a notification is now shown in the status bar.
- Enhanced WebUpdate filtering: items intended exclusively for 64-bit (and 32-bit) systems are now properly filtered.
- Fixed the CRC calculation in the WebUpdate module: it now computes the CRC based on the file content rather than the string representation.
- Introduced a silent installation option for Paquet Builder to enable streamlined deployments.
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations.
